welcome_message_body: Welcome to Narlidere, Turkey! Nestled along the beautiful Aegean coast, this charming city is known for its stunning beaches, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Narlidere has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cigli AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal serves all international flights at Adnan Menderes Airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal serves all domestic flights at Adnan Menderes Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or registration.
